-OQN0LpBuBLhEdeoNa0K.content:
Welcome! If you have any questions about the course material, assignments, schedule, or anything else related to "Understanding Emotions and Feelings", please post them here as a reply or start a new discussion.

Let's learn together!

-OQN0Lqsz6ELoYxLzCCm.content:
Hi everyone enrolled in "Understanding Emotions and Feelings"!

Use this space to chat about the course, introduce yourselves if you like, share relevant thoughts or resources, or just connect with your fellow learners. What are you hoping to get out of this course?

prompt_gateway_impression.descriptionOrPromptText: You've found it! A hidden doorway, shimmering faintly, with the words 'The Attic' etched above. You push it open... What's the very first amazing or curious thing that catches your attention?
prompt_gateway_impression.title: My First Glimpse of The Attic

prompt_gateway_story.descriptionOrPromptText: Every new arrival brings a unique story. Briefly, how did you find The Attic, and what's one big hope you carry as you step through this gateway?
prompt_gateway_story.title: My Attic Story - The Beginning

prompt_orientation_reflection.descriptionOrPromptText: Your Orientation Day tour is concluding. As you stand ready to explore on your own, what's one thought, exciting idea, or perhaps a question that's sparking in your mind right now? This is for your private student journal.
prompt_orientation_reflection.title: First Day Reflections

year1_reflection_template_2025.descriptionOrPromptText: As your first year in The Attic draws to a close, take a moment to reflect. What were the most significant discoveries you made, the challenges you overcame, and how have you grown during your time here? What are you looking forward to next?
year1_reflection_template_2025.title: My Year 1 Journey - Reflections

ws_fall2025_mysterysolving.title: Mystery Solvers Forum Workshop
ws_fall2025_mysterysolving.description: Join us for a term of collaborative mystery solving! Each month a new case.

month1.title: The Case of the Missing Mascot
month1.promptSummary: Our school mascot has vanished! Analyze initial clues.

month2.title: Interviewing Witnesses
month2.promptSummary: Develop questions and interpret statements from 'witnesses' (fellow participants or professor prompts).

month3.title: The Big Reveal
month3.promptSummary: Present your theories and collectively solve the case.
